attributes.action: ban all social networking sites especially FaceBook.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Social networking sites are failing to take responsibility to police their own site for online predators. Their excuse is that they have grown so big that they cannot do this. This however cannot allow them to hide behind their excuse culture while young boys and girls are taken advantage of under deceitful means.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
